blogPost.title: Why has multi-cloud become the right cloud approach for companies? Answer by @ClayMagouyrk, Executive Vice President, @Oracle Cloud Infrastructure. https://t.co/VJ0mMBcrCs https://t.co/nG3IPVcWni
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 为什么多云成为企业正确的云计算方式？由@Oracle云基础架构执行副总裁ClayMagouyrk回答。https://t.co/VJ0mMBcrCs https://t.co/nG3IPVcWni。
爲什麼多雲成爲企業正確的雲計算方式？由@Oracle雲基礎架構執行副總裁ClayMagouyrk回答。https://t.co/VJ0mMBcrCs https://t.co/nG3IPVcWni。

previous.title: Why is it important to have a well-diversified portfolio? Answer by Erik Hayden, Real Estate Developer and Fund Manager. https://t.co/MwMxRkULAa https://t.co/Qh5XEJ6YPj

localize.full_text: なぜ分散されたポートフォリオを持つことが重要なのでしょうか？Answer by Erik Hayden, Real Estate Developer and Fund Manager. https://t.co/MwMxRkULAa https://t.co/Qh5XEJ6YPj
为什么拥有一个良好的多元化投资组合很重要？由房地产开发商和基金经理Erik Hayden回答。https://t.co/MwMxRkULAa https://t.co/Qh5XEJ6YPj。
爲什麼擁有一個良好的多元化投資組合很重要？由房地產開發商和基金經理Erik Hayden回答。https://t.co/MwMxRkULAa https://t.co/Qh5XEJ6YPj。

next.title: Why do the public have such a mistrust of vaccines? Answer by @PerriKlass, MD, Professor of Journalism and Pediatrics, NYU, author. https://t.co/ezzcWYkoUj https://t.co/sIMUYALMMS

localize.full_text: 为什么公众对疫苗如此不信任？回答者：@PerriKlass，医学博士，纽约大学新闻学和儿科教授，作者：https://t.co/ezzcWYkoUj https://t.co/sIMUYALMMS。
爲什麼公衆對疫苗如此不信任？回答者：@PerriKlass，醫學博士，紐約大學新聞學和兒科教授，作者：https://t.co/ezzcWYkoUj https://t.co/sIMUYALMMS。
